template.description: Converts local csv files to parquet format
template.name: CsvToParquet

labels.label: Add an input Dir path for csv files
Add an output Dir path for parquet files
Define appropriate 'courses' schema under 'DemoSchema' Controller Service

Used appropriate regex for .csv to .parquet file extension
